Uses of Class
io.fluxzero.proxy.ProxyServer

  • Uses of ProxyServer in io.fluxzero.proxy

    Methods in io.fluxzero.proxy that return ProxyServer
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static ProxyServer
    ProxyServer.start(int port, ProxyRequestHandler proxyHandler)
    Starts a proxy server on the specified port with the given proxy request handler.
    static ProxyServer
    ProxyServer.start(ProxyRequestHandler proxyHandler)
    Starts a proxy server on a random available port with the specified proxy request handler.
